resources.string: this app helps you to calling any one its provide you with history and adding new names .
this button helps you to add new names by clicking it and choose save.
when you click on card in main page it move you to the add page this add page helps you to also edit , update or call the one you choose.
when you go to navigation bar and choose add image it moves you to page you have the small icon to save your image click the big one and you will have an nice image from your camera .
this App is made for you so please enjoy.
